name: Skreeta Skraw
description:
Skreeta Skraw

Skreeta Skraw is a 'Trouble'-like board game, adapted here digitally for those without a means to make a board themselves.

Features AI games and local multiplayer games.

How To Play

  • Initial roll - highest goes first. Re-roll on a tie.
  • Roll for moves. Get a six or one to take a peg out of start. A six allows you another roll. 
  • You cannot pass or land on your own pegs. If you land on another player's peg, it is returned to their start holes.
  • Get all your pegs around the board and into your home to win.
  • Click on a peg to move it. If it can move, the spot ahead will be highlighted when you mouse over it.
  • Press P in-game to bring up menu.

The game can take some time to play, feel free to take breaks.

Let me know if you encounter any issues!
